data.description: Parse and format PostgreSQL dates and times
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module has been discussed on the datetime@perl.org mailing
    list. DateTime::Format::Pg is the name preferred by the owner of
    DateTime (DROLSKY), see
    <Pine.LNX.4.53.0304261613210.27746@urth.org>.
